abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Hyena, written and directed by Gerard Johnson and starring Peter Ferdinando.
lead_paragraph: As kingpins do battle in London in Gerald Johnson’s drama, there’s plenty of human trafficking, drug smuggling and viscera.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Hyena,’ a Rogue Cop Finds Himself in Too Deep
headline.print_headline: A Rogue Cop Digs a Deep Hole

snippet: As kingpins do battle in London in Gerald Johnson’s drama, there’s plenty of human trafficking, drug smuggling and viscera.
